sentences.en: Bootleg Movie Download: Are Bootleg Movie Downloads Really Worth It?
sentences.cn: 盗版电影下载: 有盗版电影下载真的值得?

sentences.en: Goods ( especially alcohol ) are bootlegged when they aresmuggled or manufactured and sold illegally.
sentences.cn: bootleg指非法运送、制造及出售货物 ( 尤指酒 ).

sentences.en: He has sued a fan for bootlegging his concerts.
sentences.cn: 他控告一名歌迷非法录制其音乐会并出售。

sentences.en: He tried bring a suit against the company that bootleg copy of his concert.
sentences.cn: 他控告一家公司非法录制他的演唱会.

sentences.en: He wanted to run bootleg whisky to the border, and get into the big time.
sentences.cn: 他要把私酿的威士忌酒偷运到边界去赚大钱.

sentences.en: Mr. Hong was more than a simple distributor of bootleg software.
sentences.cn: 洪磊并不是简单的盗版软件销售者.

sentences.en: Some students were arrested for selling bootleg recordings on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 一些学生因在网路上贩卖盗版品而被捕.

sentences.en: Uncensored bootleg copies are peddled on the streets.
sentences.cn: 未经审查的盗版碟在街头就能买到.

sentences.en: Where did you get that rare Beatles bootleg?
sentences.cn: 你是从哪弄到那张稀有的甲壳虫乐队的盗版带的?

words.tran_cn: 非法制造；秘密得到（bootleg的ing形式）
违法的；偷运或非法制造并销售的

trans.tran_cn: 非法制造或贩卖的，违法的，违禁的，私酿的
trans.tran_en: bootleg alcohol, software, or  recording s  are made and sold illegally

trans.tran_cn: 非法制造或贩卖，违禁卖[贩，酿，运]酒，偷安线路，假传进攻
